---
id: cancel-upload-task
title: "CancelUploadTask"
description: "You can cancel an upload task through this API."
api: 
info_path: extended_services/cloud_player/en/server/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>CancelUploadTask</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


You can cancel an upload task through this API.

<Note title="Note">
- This API can only cancel tasks that are waiting, and is not applicable to tasks that have already started or ended.
- Please check the cancellation result through the [Callback](/cloud-player-server/callback/callback) or [Describe upload tasks](/cloud-player-server/describe-upload-tasks) API.
</Note>

<Note title="Note">Call frequency limit: 20 times/second</Note>

## Request
